name: ext_R4_MedicinalProductInteraction
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProductInteraction for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductInteraction from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductInteraction|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: The interactions of the medicinal product with other medicinal products, or other forms of interactions.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.
